title: Sublease this beautiful 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath Apt in Streeterville
posting_body: I'm looking to sublease this beautiful 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath with floor-to-ceiling windows, custom walk-in closet, in-home washer/dryer, and southern exposure with views of the lake and city for $2765 per month (rent & utilities).
Currently this apartment is being listed for $3500 per month online.
Don't miss out on this outstanding offer.
This luxury rental apartments paired with first-class amenities.

Residents can enjoy work-from-home conveniences – including high-speed Internet – a private fitness club curated by Equinox, a private party room, a rooftop pool and shaded cabanas, an on-site dog run and pet spa, a library, access to virtual experiences, and an outdoor terrace with a fire pit.
Located in prime Streeterville location at the Lakefront.
